name: Roomali Roti
author: Moomal Abro
summary: A tender and delicious flatbread from Central India.
directions: In a large bowl, sift together flour and salt
Add oil and mix in with a fork until flour is crumbly
Mix in water until the dough pulls together
Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes
Cover and set aside for 45 minutes
Knead dough again until smooth; divide into six equal parts
Form each part into a round
Roll out each round as thinly as possible; dust with flour to keep from sticking
Invert a heavy cast iron pan over burner and heat
Spread roti over pan and cook
Roti will cook in 40 to 50 seconds
Tiny black spots will appear when it is finished
